notes: Iconic mass-produced vehicle. Planetary transmission with three foot pedals (clutch, reverse, brake). Hand throttle on steering column. Requires specialized brass-era/vintage expertise. Limited parts availability. Final production year 1927. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ford Model T article, January 2025 revision.

Replaced Model T with modern features. Conventional sliding-gear transmission. Four-wheel mechanical brakes. Safety glass. Over 4 million produced 1927-1931. Requires vintage service expertise and period-correct parts. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ford Model A article, January 2025 revision.
